front.title: Deep Dive into IPv6 Extension Header Testing: Standalone Client / Server

abstract.t: This document proposes a methodology for isolating the location and reasons for IPv6 Extension Headers blockage in a network where the operator has access to install products and run diagnostic tests on both the client and server. Neither the client nor the server should be behind a CDN or on a Cloud infrastructure. This document is a part of the Deep Dive into EH Testing set of documents.
